moves.name: Leech Life
moves.description: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Acid
moves.description: The opposing team is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. The acid may also lower the targets' Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Bide
moves.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

moves.name: Curse
moves.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

moves.name: Struggle Bug
moves.description: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets' Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

moves.name: Mega Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Yawn
moves.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

moves.name: Protect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Acid Armor
moves.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Bug Buzz
moves.description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Recover
moves.description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

moves.name: Guard Swap
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the target.

moves.name: Final Gambit
moves.description: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to the user's HP.
